update t_mds_order
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
physical_store_id = #{physicalStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_amount = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payable_amount = #{payableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_activity_id = #{storeActivityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
store_activity_name = #{storeActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_activity_amount = #{storeActivityAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
coupon_amount = #{couponAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_vip_pay = #{isVipPay,jdbcType=BIT},
vip_amount = #{vipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_id = #{vipId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_small_money = #{isSmallMoney,jdbcType=BIT},
small_money_amount = #{smallMoneyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
small_money_reason = #{smallMoneyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
people_count = #{peopleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_placer_type = #{orderPlacerType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
order_placer_id = #{orderPlacerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_placer_name = #{orderPlacerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
consignee_name = #{consigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consignee_phone = #{consigneePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
buyer_memo = #{buyerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saler_memo = #{salerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
give_food_amount = #{giveFoodAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_mds_order set store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, physical_store_id = #{physicalStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_amount = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payable_amount = #{payableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_activity_id = #{storeActivityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_activity_name = #{storeActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_activity_amount = #{storeActivityAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coupon_amount = #{couponAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_vip_pay = #{isVipPay,jdbcType=BIT}, vip_amount = #{vipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vip_id = #{vipId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_small_money = #{isSmallMoney,jdbcType=BIT}, small_money_amount = #{smallMoneyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, small_money_reason = #{smallMoneyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, people_count = #{peopleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_placer_type = #{orderPlacerType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, order_placer_id = #{orderPlacerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_placer_name = #{orderPlacerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, consignee_name = #{consigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_phone = #{consigneePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, buyer_memo = #{buyerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saler_memo = #{salerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, give_food_amount = #{giveFoodAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as rq, count(0) as dds, ifnull(sum(pay_amount),0) as yye, ifnull(sum(small_money_amount),0) as mlje, ifnull(sum(pay_amount),0) as yysr, 0 as czsr, ifnull(sum(pay_amount),0) as hjsr from t_mds_order where store_id = #{storeId} and order_status = 7
and order_placer_type = 1 and order_type = 1
and order_placer_type = 2 and order_type = 1
and order_placer_type = 2 and order_type = 2
and create_time >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= create_time
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%T') >= #{startRangeTime}
and #{endRangeTime} >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%T')
and physical_store_id in
#{item}
group by rq order by rq desc

select b.id as id, b.city_name as cs, b.name as md, count(0) as dds, ifnull(sum(a.pay_amount),0) as yye, ifnull(sum(a.small_money_amount),0) as mlje, ifnull(sum(a.pay_amount),0) as yysr, 0 as czsr, ifnull(sum(a.pay_amount),0) as hjsr from t_mds_order a left join t_mps_physical_store b on b.id = a.physical_store_id where a.store_id = #{storeId} and a.order_status = 7
and a.order_placer_type = 1 and a.order_type = 1
and a.order_placer_type = 2 and a.order_type = 1
and a.order_placer_type = 2 and a.order_type = 2
and a.create_time >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= a.create_time
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%T') >= #{startRangeTime}
and #{endRangeTime} >= DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%T')
and a.physical_store_id in
#{item}
group by md
select ifnull(sum(payable_amount),0) from t_mds_order where store_id = #{storeId} and order_status = 7
select count(0) from t_mds_order where store_id = #{storeId} and order_status = 7

select ifnull(sum(a.payable_amount),0) as xfje, b.vip_name as name from t_mds_order a left join t_mds_member b on a.vip_id = b.id where a.store_id = #{storeId} and a.order_status = 7 and a.is_vip_pay = 1 order by xfje desc limit 3
